Name: CallOfTree
About the game: About This Game a game to see the scenery 'CallOfTree' is a first-person shooter game that requires a high-spec PC of a gamer made with Unreal Engine 5. The difficulty level is very easy and the purpose of this game is to see beautiful scenery. It's a very simple structure game where you just have to follow the road. Along the road, there are trees you can talk to. The trees will tell you where to go. You have to shoot out the intruders who sometimes appear. It's a story about a gamer who went to another world saving the world. First person/3rd person can be changed and stored on a level-by-level basis One level has about 10 minutes of play time I used the latest version 5.1 of Unreal Engine I tried to add DLSS, but it was put on hold because the usage changed as the Unreal version was upgraded to 5.1 Developer computer's RTX3070 produces at least 30 frames and an average of 40 frames with the 2k High option.
